name: Paint.NET Grid Warp Grid
summary: A WARPGRID file is a distortion effect that can be applied to an image in Paint.NET, using the Grid Warp plug-in . It contains a grid whose points have been moved to warp an image. Users create and save WARPGRID files from within the Grid Warp window, available by selecting Effects → Tools → Grid Warp... from Paint.NET's menu bar (after installing the Grid Warp plug-in).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: WARPGRID file open in Paint.NET with Grid Warp plug-in installed
